mapper.select: select count(*) from p_se where batch_no=#{batchNo} and line_no=#{lineNo} and create_date=#{createDate}

SELECT se1.batch_no,se1.line_no,se1.se_format,se1.se_status,se1.strength,se1.elongation,DATE_FORMAT(se1.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') create_date FROM (SELECT batch_no,line_no,se_format,se_status,strength,elongation,create_date FROM p_se WHERE se_status=0 AND DATE(create_date)=#{createDate}) se1, (SELECT batch_no,line_no FROM p_se WHERE se_status=1 AND DATE(create_date)=#{createDate}) se2 WHERE se1.batch_no=se2.batch_no AND se1.line_no=se2.line_no UNION SELECT batch_no,line_no,se_format,se_status,strength,elongation,create_date FROM p_se WHERE se_status=1 AND DATE(create_date)=#{createDate} ORDER BY batch_no,line_no,se_status
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM p_se WHERE batch_no=#{batchNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} AND create_date=#{createDate}
mapper.update: UPDATE p_se SET se_status=0 WHERE batch_no=#{batchNo} AND line_no=#{lineNo} AND create_date=#{createDate}
